project.description:
Install Local Atom
Creates Local Atom with name Jenkins01 and attaches to environment #jenkins

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd ${SCRIPTS_HOME} INSTALL_DIR="/var/jenkins_home/boomi" ATOM_HOME=${INSTALL_DIR}/Atom_${atomName}
source bin/installerToken.sh atomType="ATOM"
bin/installAtom.sh atomName="${atomName}" tokenId=${tokenId} INSTALL_DIR="${INSTALL_DIR}" source bin/createEnvAndAttachRoleAndAtom.sh env="#jenkins" classification="TEST" atomName=${atomName} roleName="Administrator" purgeHistoryDays="1"
${ATOM_HOME}/bin/atom stop > /dev/null 2>&1 &
cd ${ATOM_HOME}/bin sed -e 's/512/128/g' atom.vmoptions > atom.vmoptions_1 mv atom.vmoptions_1 atom.vmoptions
bash --rcfile <(nohup ${ATOM_HOME}/bin/atom start > /dev/null 2>&1 &)
